project_abstract.cdata: The Second Tarim Basin Project aims at a) increasing incomes of poor farmers through irrigated agriculture development; b) establishing mechanisms for sustainable use, development, and management of water resources and land in Tarim Basin; and c) partially restoring and preserving the "green corridor" in the lower reaches of the Tarim River.  There are eight project components.  First, water conservancy measures include irrigation and drainage system rehabilitation and improvements, hydropower stations, and transmission lines.  Second, land reclamation will cover non-productive lands with a total area of 75,350 hectares.  Third, land improvement will cover low-yield irrigated lands with a total area of 105,350 hectares.  Fourth, agricultural support services will support on-farm development in terms of seed availability, machinery services, technology transfer, etc.  Fifth, environmental protection and monitoring will improve quality and quantity of ground and surface water.  Sixth, institutional development support will strengthen prefecture and county Project Management Offices (PMOs), self-financing irrigation and drainage districts, and line agencies.  Seventh, Tarim Basin Water Resources Commission support will finance institutional development support and measures on mainstream of the Tarim River to improve water management and water delivery to the lower reaches of the river.  Eighth, regional management will support the Regional PMO and training facilities.

P046563.projectinfo: <![CDATA[<Project><LangCode>ZH</LangCode><ProjectName>塔里木盆地项目二期</ProjectName><ProjectAbstract>该项目旨在进一步改进位于南疆塔里木盆地的经济落后地区的农业生产，提高当地20万贫困农户的收入，解决粮食供应问题。通过改善现有的灌溉和排水系统，开垦无灌溉设施的土地，提高低产田的粮食产量，改进农场的农业辅助服务，提供技术援助、培训和科研计划。该项目的一项重要内容是促进机构建设，加强地县级的项目管理单位和水利部门。</ProjectAbstract></Project>]]>
